data.title: Times of India Entertainment
data.meta_description: Mammootty News: Check out the latest news about Mammootty along with Mammootty movies, Mammootty photos, Mammootty videos and more on Times of India Entertainment.
data.text:
Mammootty wears a shirt designed by a fan battling a rare neuromuscular disease

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 17:29 (IST)

Mammootty wore a shirt designed by Jesfer Kottakunnu, who has muscular dystrophy, at the ‘Idiyan Chandhu’ promo song launch. Jesfer, who paints by holding a brush in his teeth, met Mammootty during a ‘Turbo’ event in Dubai. Mammootty continues projects like ‘Bazooka’ and ‘Manorathangal’, highlighting Jesfer's talent and the challenges of muscular dystrophy.

When Dulquer Salmaan was mockingly welcomed with ‘Mammootty ki Jai’ at his first public function

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 14:06 (IST)

Dulquer Salmaan discusses struggles in Malayalam industry, aiming to break free from being seen only as Mammootty's son. Despite past public ridicule, he has shown grace and talent in his career. Recent film 'King of Kotha' disappoints. Will he overcome these challenges and shine again?

Dulquer Salmaan talks about wanting to shake off the tag of being a star kid; calls himself a ‘fiercely proud son’ of his father Mammootty

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 00:50 (IST)

Dulquer Salmaan discusses challenges of breaking away from his father's shadow in a recent interview. The actor shares his thoughts on seeking recognition in other languages and opens up about his mental health. Stay tuned for his upcoming movie 'Lucky Bhaskar'.

Mammootty turns a private investigator in Gautham Vasudev Menon’s Malayalam directorial debut, reports

etimes.in / Jul 18, 2024, 18:17 (IST)

Gautham Vasudev Menon’s first Malayalam film stars Mammootty as a Sherlock Holmes-like investigator. Joining Mammootty are Gokul Suresh and Lenaa. Upcoming projects include 'Bazooka' by Deeno Dennis, 'Manorathangal' releasing August 15, and 'Turbo' streaming August 9. Dhyan Sreenivasan commented on Asif Ali controversy and Ramesh Narayan’s apology. Asianet News confirmed it's an investigative thriller.

Mammootty surprises young fan Mahadev on his birthday and gifts him an unforgettable memory- Video

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 15:58 (IST)

Mammootty surprises a young fan on his birthday with a special gift, creating a memorable moment. The actor's upcoming film with Gautham Vasudev Menon has started filming, with speculation about the cast. Gautham Menon is also involved in Mammootty's upcoming project 'Bazooka', directed by Deeno Dennis.

‘Manorathangal’ trailer: Kamal Haasan, Mohanlal and Mammootty star in the anthology series

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 01:02 (IST)

The anthology series 'Manorathangal' scripted by M. T. Vasudevan Nair features 9 films with a stellar cast including Kamal Haasan, Mohanlal, and Mammootty. Directed by eight filmmakers, the series will be released on ZEE5 in multiple languages on August 15.

Mammootty's 'Turbo' set for OTT release; here's the official date

etimes.in / Jul 11, 2024, 11:08 (IST)

Mammootty fans are in for a treat as the highly anticipated action drama 'Turbo' prepares for its digital debut. After previously announcing the OTT release month, the makers have now confirmed the exact date for viewers to mark on their calendars. Stay tuned as 'Turbo' prepares to race onto screens, promising an unforgettable journey into the heart of high-stakes drama and intrigue.

Indian Film Festival of Melbourne 2024 nominations out; Shah Rukh Khan to compete with Kartik Aaryan, Diljit Dosanjh for Best Actor

ANI / Jul 10, 2024, 16:25 (IST)

This year's Best Actor category boasts nominations for Shah Rukh Khan for his performances in 'Dunki' and 'Jawan,' alongside Vikrant Massey, Fahadh Faasil, Ranveer Singh, Kartik Aaryan, and Mithun Chakraborty. Alia Bhatt has been nominated for Best Actress for her role in 'Rocky Aur RKii Prem Kahaani,' competing against Jyothika, Parvathy Thiruvothu, and rising stars Nitanshi Goel and Pratibha Ranta from 'Laapataa Ladies.' Shah Rukh Khan's dual nominations underscore his versatility and enduring appeal in Indian cinema, while Alia Bhatt continues to impress with her diverse roles. The nomination list reflects a blend of established stars and promising newcomers, highlighting the industry's evolving talent pool and audience preferences. The awards ceremony promises to be a celebration of exceptional performances across genres, recognizing achievements in acting and storytelling that have captivated audiences over the past year.

Mammootty- Gautham Vasudev Menon film, Gokul Suresh roped in for the project

etimes.in / Jul 10, 2024, 15:36 (IST)

Anticipation is high in the Malayalam film industry as the iconic Mammootty joins forces with celebrated director Gautham Vasudev Menon for their first collaboration in Malayalam cinema. The film, which began with a ceremonial puja, represents a notable venture for Gautham Vasudev Menon, renowned for his exceptional storytelling in films such as 'Vaaranam Aayiram' and others.

When Shine Tom Chacko confessed that he has tried to enact like Mohanlal and Mammootty!

etimes.in / Jul 10, 2024, 12:00 (IST)

Shine Tom Chacko opens up about his experiences in the Malayalam film industry, including his early attempts at imitating popular actors. He discusses the impact of Fahadh Faasil on his career and his approach to characterisation in performances.

Amalda Liz on sharing her first scene with Mammootty in ‘Bramayugam’: Mammukka calms us down - Exclusive

etimes.in / Jul 08, 2024, 17:21 (IST)

Amalda Liz revealed, “Although I didn’t have many scenes with Mammootty, my first scene in ‘Bramayugam’ was with him. My shot in the movie started with him, and naturally, I was tense. But Mammukka has a way of calming everyone down. Performing in front of a ‘Master’ like him inevitably brings some tension.”

Confirmed! ‘Turbo’ OTT release: Mammootty’s action thriller to start streaming on THIS date

etimes.in / Jul 08, 2024, 16:49 (IST)

Mammootty's much-anticipated action thriller 'Turbo' is set to release on SonyLIV this August. The film, directed by Vysakh and written by Midhun Manuel Thomas, follows the story of Turbo Jose, a jeep driver seeking justice. 'Turbo' has garnered positive reviews and box office success, offering a blend of action and storytelling.

Did you know Mammootty was supposed to play ‘Kadamattathu Kathanar’? Here’s why the film didn’t happen

etimes.in / Jul 04, 2024, 17:26 (IST)

As anticipation builds for Jayasurya and Rojin Thomas’ upcoming film ‘Kathanar: The Wild Sorcerer,’ an intriguing piece of trivia has surfaced about a previously planned film on the same subject, which was to feature Mammootty in the lead role. During the promotions of his recent release ‘DNA,’ director TS Suresh Babu disclosed that he once envisioned a grand project titled ‘Kadamattathu Kathanar’ with Mammootty portraying the titular character.

Netizens troll Tini Tom’s imitation of ‘Kodumon Potty’, says “Misfortune of Mammootty who had to see that”

etimes.in / Jul 04, 2024, 15:33 (IST)

Tini Tom's comedic portrayal of Mammootty's character 'Kodumon Potty' from 'Bramayugam' has caused a stir on social media. Mixed reactions to the skit, with some praising the humor and others finding it disrespectful. Director Nishad subtly pokes fun at Tini Tom. Tini Tom addresses strained friendship with Mammootty.

‘Turbo’ OTT release: Mammootty starrer to start digital streaming soon

etimes.in / Jun 23, 2024, 12:12 (IST)

'Turbo' narrates the adventurous journey of Aruvipurathu Jose, fondly known as Turbo Jose and played by Mammootty. The storyline unfolds as Jose finds himself embroiled in a dilemma involving his friend Jerry and a woman named Indhulekha, prompting him to relocate to Chennai. However, his arrival in the bustling city triggers a chain of events that introduces him to Vetrivel Shamugha Sundaram, portrayed by Raj B. Shetty, a local underworld figure.

‘Maharaja’ actor Vijay Sethupathi praises Mammootty’s performance in ‘Nanpakal Nerathu Mayakkam’

etimes.in / Jun 18, 2024, 17:09 (IST)

Vijay Sethupathi, currently enjoying the success of his recent film 'Maharaja,' has praised Mammootty's exceptional performance in Lijo Jose Pellissery's drama 'Nanpakal Nerathu Mayakkam.' Known for its compelling narrative and direction, the film has garnered attention for Mammootty's portrayal of dual personalities, earning acclaim from critics and audiences. Vijay Sethupathi commended 'Nanpakal Nerathu Mayakkam,' particularly highlighting Mammootty’s nuanced acting.

Mammootty’s action flick ‘Turbo’ set to wow Arabic audiences

etimes.in / Jun 18, 2024, 15:37 (IST)

Mammootty is riding a wave of success this year with the action-packed film ‘Turbo,’ following the earlier hit ‘Bramayugam.’ Despite receiving mixed reviews, ‘Turbo’ has been performing strongly at the box office and is now preparing for an exciting new release. The makers of ‘Turbo’ have announced the launch of an Arabic version teaser, a strategic move aimed at expanding the film’s reach.

Is Mammootty - Gautham Vasudev Menon’s upcoming film delayed?

etimes.in / Jun 17, 2024, 17:07 (IST)

The collaboration between Malayalam cinema megastar Mammootty and filmmaker-turned-actor Gautham Vasudev Menon for two projects, 'Bazooka' and an untitled Malayalam film, has faced a delay. The untitled project, Gautham Vasudev Menon's directorial debut in the Malayalam film industry, was initially scheduled to start filming on June 15, 2024, in Chennai but has been postponed to July 2024 with Kochi as the new filming location.

Mammootty marks Eid al-Adha with prayers at Edappally Salafi Masjid

etimes.in / Jun 17, 2024, 15:02 (IST)

Megastar Mammootty celebrated Eid al-Adha (Bakrid) with solemnity and grace at the Salafi Masjid in Edappally. The occasion, observed worldwide by Muslims to honor Prophet Ibrahim's willingness to sacrifice his son, Ismail, saw Mammootty donning a white-printed shirt and pants as he arrived early to offer prayers. This year's Eid al-Adha prayer marked a contrast from last year's viral moment when Mammootty and his son Dulquer Salmaan were seen offering namaaz at the Kaloor International Stadium in Kochi during Eid Ul-Fitr celebrations.

Samantha soon to make her Malayalam debut alongside Mammootty!

etimes.in / Jun 13, 2024, 13:54 (IST)

Actress Samantha, known for her work in Tamil and Telugu industries, is set to make her Mollywood debut with an upcoming action thriller alongside Mamootty. The film, directed by Gautham Vasudev Menon, is highly anticipated.
